ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] The exact recipe
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i asked if someone tried the recipe WITH GIZMO #6 that is what was made with it, it wasn t made with gizmo #4... if you haven t noticed, a lot of gnome
ygData.messageBody:
ok i asked if someone tried the recipe WITH GIZMO #6
that is what was made with it, it wasn't made with
gizmo #4...

if you haven't noticed, a lot of gnome tinkered
objects are supposedly "dangerous" like the stalking
probes for example...read the gimblestan heh

so again, has anyone tried this recipe with gizmo #6?
p.s. as far as i can tell i doubt this will work
myself, seeing how you usually don't stack items..oh
well if you are that bored pls try it

--- Dave Barrett <djbarret@...> wrote:
> Yes, I did try the exact recipe.
>
> Those items did not combine in those quantities. I
> did it with the
> gizmo number 4, the one that was supposed to be the
> replacement. I
> didn't bother with the gizmo number 6.
>
> I'm thinking that this is a red herring, since
> Verant said they were
> going to address tinkering after they did poison,
> which was due for
> fixing in may.
>
> Llabak Tharr
> 35 Mage and Master beggar, brewer and tinker (118)
> Tarew Marr
>
>
